# MobileDocumentReader.Configuration

**Structure**

A type that represents the configuration of the mobile document reader.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Configuration
```

## Overview

Use the reader’s configuration to generate a reader token on your server.

## Instance Properties

- **readerInstanceIdentifier**: The unique identifier for the mobile document reader instance.

## Retrieving the reader configuration

- **configuration**: The configuration of the mobile document reader.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
